alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes; Leake; Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 16 at 12:39PM CDT until April 16 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LEAKE...SOUTHEASTERN HOLMES...CENTRAL ATTALA AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 1238 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Possumneck to near Camden, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Hesterville and Possumneck around 1245 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include West and Sallis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
